item.title: A Brief Overview of Ubuntu 9.10 Karmic Koala
item.description: Just got my hands on to latest version of Ubuntu 9.10 Karmic Koala around 5 hours ago. So, this will be a very brief overview of Ubuntu’s latest version. Me being Ubuntu crazy, just started exploring it after downloading it. I setup my 8 GB Corsair Flash Voyager as a bootable Ubuntu 9.10 drive using USB Startup Disk Creator available in Jaunty. Booting into the live system was similar as before except for the color and design of the Ubuntu logo on bootup has changed.
